page.title: 13Trade in Strathmiglo
page.content: The one business street in Strathmiglo is the High Street.There is a bank,a post office,three hotels,one garage,a hairdresser and six shops.Five of these are food shops and one is a shoe shop. The shoe shop is A.T.HOGG(FIFE)Ltd.The business was first established in 1888,when the original Mr.Hogg sold boots and shoes by mail order,buying in all boots and shoes he advertised and sold.He then turned to the manufacturing side and equipped a factory at Strathmiglo.He opened shops in many nearby towns. Nowadays,boots and shoes are no longer manufactured in Strathmiglo,but boots and shoes can still be purchased by mail order from Scotland's oldest established mail order company or from shops in many parts of the country.
